page.title: 06GAMES IN 1985
page.content: {Stick in the Mud,}to play this one person is on it. You try to avoid this person. If he touches you, you must stand with your legs apart and arms outstretched. When another free person goes through your legs you are free. The game continues until everyone is caught. You have teams of chasers. {Ball Touch,}someone throws a soft ball and ties to hit the rest. If you get touched you are on it and must try to hit someone else with the ball, but as soon as the thrower has the ball the rest have to stand still. {Tick.}One person is on it and has to try to touch you. When they touch you they say 'Tick' and you are on it. {Blocky}1.2.3.,a version of Hide and Seek. One person is on it and counts to a specified number while the others hide. The person who is on it has to try to find the others. When the
